Our aim is to become a professional community where you can reach new heights by uplifting each other.

• create your account as candidate or a referrer.
• request for referrals.
• refer other candidates.
• chat with each other after approval of the referrer

• you get 500 coins by default.
• as a candidate, for every successful referral you will spend 100 coins.
• if your application gets rejected, you will get the 100 coins credited back.
• as a referrer, for every successful referral you will get 100 coins.
• for every invite you will get 300 coins.
• we will add more ways to earn and spend coins (suggestions are welcomed).

• use your google account to login or sign up.
• select your role after login.
• create profile by adding basic details about you and your company.
• you can create a profile of other role using same google account.

• after you request for a referral, the status is pending.
• if the referrer likes the profile he/she will change the status to accepted.
• referrer will upload a photo or a screenshot depicting the submission of the referral.
• our team will confirm the same and transfer the coins.
